channel.title: Character Window Opens
channel.description:
Ok i have basically got a blank source with not much things on for me to learn basic coding on
i know how to set a unique look in player.java
how ever people who come on my server might not want to look like that so i want to add a character window design screen as i have seen on other servers.
Ok i found out the interface id is 3559
i also know a code is : setInterfaceWalkable(3559);
i just dont know where to insert everything so it works.
If you dont know what i mean look at the picture below.
[IMG]http://www.worldsinmotion.biz/runescapeavatar.jpg[/img]

item.title: Character Window Opens
item.dc:creator: @burg355 burg355
item.description:
@burg355 wrote:

nahh i got the command mate i just thought it would be easier if they log in and it appears…

Read full topic

item.title: Character Window Opens
item.dc:creator: @client_class client class
item.description:
@client_class wrote:

[quote=“burg355, post:1, topic:286261”]Ok i have basically got a blank source with not much things on for me to learn basic coding on

i know how to set a unique look in player.java

how ever people who come on my server might not want to look like that so i want to add a character window design screen as i have seen on other servers.

Ok i found out the interface id is 3559

i also know a code is : setInterfaceWalkable(3559);

i just dont know where to insert everything so it works.

If you dont know what i mean look at the picture below.

[/quote]

Heres a ::char code if you need it.

} else if (command.startsWith("char")) {
            showInterface(3559);

You can put this anywhere under any code, it would help if it was a command but if not then thats ok.

But I don’t really know how to do it when they log in, it would take a while to find it

Read full topic
